name: PitchCount

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pitch count
des: What is the best baseball pitch to throw? It depends on the number of balls and strikes a hitter has. This skill provides baseball scenarios that help you learn new pitches to throw. Detailed descriptions of each type of pitch and how to grip the ball are included.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
